decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Existing Location Plan EX-L001, Existing Front Rear Elevations EX-E001, Existing First Floor EX-P002, Existing Ground Floor EX-P001, Existing Loft Plan EX-P003, Existing Roof Plan EX-P004, Existing Section AA and BB EX-S001, Existing Side Elevation EX-E002, Proposed Roof Plan PR-P004 rev D, Proposed Ground Floor PR-P001 rev D, Proposed Loft Plan PR-P003 rev D, Proposed Ground Floor PR-P001 rev D, Proposed First Floor PR-P002 rev D, Proposed Front and Rear Elevation PR-E001 rev D, Proposed Side Elevation PR-E002 rev D, Proposed Section AA and BB PR-S001 rev D, Design and Access Statement July 2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the hereby approved extensions.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Two storey side and single storey rear (wrap around) extension
